event.title: IV Jornades de Programari Lliure
event.body: The "Jornades des Programari Lliure" is a Free Software conference in Vilanova i la Geltr√∫, Catalonia. Karin Kosina will give an introduction to 3D programming with Coin3D on 7 July at 15:30 and hold a speech about making money with Free Software on 8 July at 11:30.
